titleStmt.title: Pourtraict of the new wonderful blazing star, which appear'd to the innter Austrian countries, and the adjacent parts of Croatia, standing over Rackelsburg and Czackenthurn, seen betwixt two and three of the clock several mornings, from the 12th of January, 1664. To the terrour of the beholders.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. M. and are to be sold by E. Brewster at the Crane in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Text in two columns with caption titles at top of each.
Includes a high-Dutch copy and Low-Dutch copy.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: the Crane in St. Paul's Church-yard
